title: Fact Check: This date sheet of Class 12 examination has not been released by CBSE or HRD Ministry | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A document is doing the rounds on the different social media platforms, showing the date sheet of Class 12th examination.

According to the document, the exams will start on July 1, 2020, and end on July 15, 2020.

The title of the document reads ‘Central board of secondary examination | Senior school certificate examination 2020 | Date Sheet for remaining and rescheduled examination in India and North-East district of Delhi’

We also found a video on YouTube showing both pages of the document.

NewsMobile fact-checked the above claim and found it to be FAKE.

Government sources confirmed that no date sheet has yet been released by CBSE or the HRD Ministry

The Press Information Bureau (PIB) in a tweet, explicitly clarified, that this information is untrue and Union HRD Minister, Dr Ramesh Pokhriyal Nishank, will be releasing the date sheet for Class 10th and 12th on May 16, 2020, at 5 pm.

In conclusion, it is clear that the document being circulated and the claim being made are FAKE.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
